title: (x) Timberline Industries - Futura {Ignacio}
content:
I need a font like the one in the tagline sans serif, clean, legible even at small sizes.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001055im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26422.gif)   
   
Any sugestions?
author: pgarcez
